# Loading packages

```{r}

library("tidyverse")
```

# Loading data files

```{r}

blood <- read_csv(file = "data/blood_load.csv")

tonsil <- read_csv(file = "data/tonsil_load.csv")

thymus <- read_csv(file = "data/thymus_load.csv")
```

# Cleaning blood data

```{r}

selected_measures <- c("CVQb", "MedQb", "count", "PEpos")

blood_clean <- blood |>
  select(CD, ends_with(selected_measures)) |>
  pivot_longer(cols = ends_with(selected_measures),
               names_to = c("Cell_type", ".value"),
               names_pattern = "(.*)_(.*)",
               values_drop_na = TRUE)

```
